key.name: restore-insert-mark
key.description: Jump to the last position when reopening a file

key.name: show-line-changes
key.description: If enabled, the editor will show line additions and changes next to the source code.

key.name: highlight-current-line
key.description: If enabled, the editor will highlight the line containing the cursor.

key.name: highlight-matching-brackets
key.description: If enabled, the editor will highlight matching brackets.

key.name: show-line-numbers
key.description: If enabled, the editor will show line numbers.

key.name: smart-backspace
key.description: Backspace will remove additional spaces to keep you aligned to the indentation size.

key.name: smart-home-end
key.description: Whether or not Home moves to first non-space character.

key.name: show-grid-lines
key.description: If enabled, the editor will show grid lines in the document.

key.name: show-map
key.description: If enabled, Builder will display an overview map of the source file next to the editor.

key.name: auto-hide-map
key.description: If enabled, Builder will automatically hide the overview map when mouse focus leaves the editor, or a timeout occurs.

key.name: draw-spaces
key.description: The various types of space to draw in the editor.

key.name: overscroll
key.description: The number of lines to scroll beyond the end of the buffer.
